<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Q1 &lt;&lt;= 1;      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update Q1 = 2P/abs(NC)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="43"><span class="doxyHighlight">    R1 &lt;&lt;= 1;      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update R1 = rem(2P/abs(NC))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="44"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (R1.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint/#af4b1ccc0b78f9da9f3f3944e06007f1d">uge</a>(ANC)) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be unsigned comparison</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00045" /><CodeLine lineNumber="45"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++Q1;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="47"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="48"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Q2 &lt;&lt;= 1;     </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// update Q2 = 2P/abs(D)</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="50"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a>.uge(AD)) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// must be unsigned comparison</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="51"><span class="doxyHighlight">      ++Q2;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="52"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a> -= AD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00053" /><CodeLine lineNumber="53"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00054" /><CodeLine lineNumber="54"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Delta = AD - R2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00055" /><CodeLine lineNumber="55"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Delta = AD;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="56"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Delta -= <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/mathextras-h/#a9211f62d8e1e6de999eaa63ec0f6ae02">R2</a>;</span></CodeLine>
